Analyte(s): Conserved region in S. aureus-specific gene
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Real-time multiplex polymerase chain reaction (PCR) assay
Methodologies: Automated data analysis with ELITe MGB® Software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MRSA/SA ELITe MGB qualitative real-time PCR assay and automated software for detecting S. aureus and MRSA from nasal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of Staphylococcus aureus (SA) and methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) DNA from nasal swabs, to aid prevention and control of MRSA infections in healthcare settings, not for diagnosis or monitoring.
